name: Alveston Manor Boutique Hotel & Spa
description: Cosy rooms with free Wi-Fi & TVs in a sophisticated hotel featuring a spa & a restaurant.

name: 12 Apostles Hotel & Spa
description: Upscale property offering ocean views, a spa & restaurants, as well as a cinema & outdoor pools.

name: The Oyster Box Hotel
description: Luxe hotel offering refined rooms & suites, plus breakfast, a spa & an oceanfront pool.

name: Beverly Hills Hotel
description: Laid-back quarters with ocean views, plus a poolside spa, a cafe/bar and a fine-dining restaurant.

name: Santé Wellness Retreat and Spa
description: Refined suites & villas in a Spanish Colonial-style hotel, plus a spa, 2 pools & upscale dining.

name: Libra Lodge
description: Simply furnished rooms in a down-to-earth bed-and-breakfast featuring an outdoor pool & dining.
